=== Current Issues ===
<pre>
Network monitor doesn't activate at boot
Gnome Power Manager only shows up if AC unplugged
Ambient light sensor and illuminated keyboard does not function
Trackpad is painfully slow
No right click solution for single button trackpad
No single or double tap on the trackpad
No scroll on the trackpad
</pre>
